@graph.keywords: predictive traffic optimization, route planning, traffic congestion avoidance, fleet management, real-time routing, dynamic route planning, traffic pattern analysis, on-time delivery optimization, last mile logistics, time-based routing, transportation efficiency, traffic data integration, delivery time windows, route sequencing, traffic-aware routing

@graph.name: Advanced Constraint - Predictive Traffic Optimization
@graph.description: Our Predictive Traffic Route Optimization add-on takes billions of traffic patterns into account and re-sequences your routes to avoid areas of heavy congestion. It adapts to real-world conditions, recognizing that traffic changes throughout the day - a highway that's clear in the morning might be congested in the afternoon. With this technology, your drivers will get to their destinations on time, meeting customer expectations regardless of traffic conditions. This advanced constraint helps fleet managers deliver reliable service even when faced with unpredictable traffic patterns.
